alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Flagler County through 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Bunnell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell and Beverly Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.
